title: ⚠️ Weekly Backup ⚠️
message: It is important that you back up your data frequently – at least once a week – as the OS might delete those in case of inactivity. Would you like to export all open entries now?

alert.sure: You are about to erase all data and restore those you have selected. Are you sure you want to continue?

text: Backup and restore the entire database and all its local data.
example: These options can be interesting if you want to transfer the data or if you are getting a new phone.
